text: Sonam Tenzin (born 20 October 1986) is a football player from Bhutan. He plays as Forward for Druk Pol, having previously played in the Indian 3rd division for Buddhist Blue Stars. He is also a member of the Bhutanese national team. ==Career statistics== ===International goals=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !!
